mapper.select: SELECT A.HTBM, A.XH, (SELECT D.QGDH FROM CGQGD D WHERE D.QGDBM = A.QGDBM), A.QGDMXSUBXH, A.HTSL, A.DJ, A.SLV MWSKZ, TO_CHAR(A.JHRQ, 'YYYYMMDD') JHRQ, A.PHSB, A.WZWH, A.BZ, A.DYSM, A.DZ, A.SJSL, (SELECT TB.UNIT_CODE FROM VIEW_UNIT TB WHERE TB.UNIT_ID = A.JLDW AND TB.NLS_ID = B.NLSID AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM XTXMBM XM WHERE XM.XMBM = B.XMBM AND TB.MARIANCODE = XM.MARIANCODE)) ZLDW, A.RLI_ID, A.ZZ, (SELECT TB.WZBM FROM TB_PLAN_TEMP TB WHERE TB.CGSQBM = A.FABM AND ROWNUM = 1) WZBM, (SELECT TB.WZDMS FROM T_MV_VM_MARIAN_CLMS TB WHERE TB.WZBM = A.WZBM AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM XTXMBM XM WHERE XM.XMBM = B.XMBM AND TB.YYMS = B.NLSID AND TB.DJDWBM = B.DJDWBM AND TB.MARIANCODE = XM.MARIANCODE)) WZMC, (SELECT TB.GGXH FROM TB_PLAN_TEMP TB WHERE TB.CGSQBM = A.FABM AND ROWNUM = 1) GGXH, A.QGDBM, A.QGDMXXH, (SELECT TB.IDENT_CODE FROM T_MV_VM_MARIAN_CLMS TB WHERE TB.WZBM = A.WZBM AND TB.YYMS = B.NLSID AND TB.DJDWBM = B.DJDWBM AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM XTXMBM XM WHERE XM.XMBM = B.XMBM AND TB.YYMS = B.NLSID AND TB.DJDWBM = B.DJDWBM AND TB.MARIANCODE = XM.MARIANCODE)) ZWZBM, B.JEBZBM, B.KJXYBH FROM CGHTMX A, CGHT B WHERE A.HTBM = B.HTBM AND A.HTBM = #{htbm}
